articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
I am a physician (rheumatology and clinical pharmacology) and clinical
data scientist. Aside from my clinical work, I am the Data Science Lead
in the Medicines Optimisation Service at Austin Health and a PhD student
at the University of Melbourne, studying applied machine learning in
pharmacovigilance.
Education
PhD in Machine Learning
University of Melbourne
2021 - present
Bachelor of Medicine/Bachelor of Surgery
University of Melbourne
2009 - 2013
Bachelor of Science / Bachelor of Arts (Mathematics, Physics,
Philosophy)
University of Tasmania
2005 - 2008
Graduate Diploma in Biostatistics
Monash University
2012-2015
